info.description: This environment presents an example of using Harmony Core to expose a collection of RESTful Web Service endpoints that allow you to interact with a small sample dataset.
info.title: Harmony Core Sample API

tags.name: Plant
tags.description: Operations related to Plant Master Record

get.description: Get all or a filtered collection of customers.

parameters.name: $orderby

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Maximum number of rows to return.

parameters.name: $skip
